## RouteValidateFunction type

The custom validation function if @<!-- -->kbn/config-schema is not a valid solution for your specific plugin requirements.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type RouteValidateFunction<T> = (data: any) => RouteValidateFunctionReturn<T>;
```
